name: Windy Laundry
description:
A tornado has stroke your home while you have the hanging clothes outside. Try to save the clothes by pinning them and moving them away from the falling cows!

Keyboard controls:
A, D: move left / right
shift / S: grab the cloth / put the cloth
space / W: pin / put the cloth

Gamepad controls:
A: pin / put the cloth
B: grab the cloth / put the cloth
Sticks / Arrows: move left / right
